attributes.action: If regions vote remain the the UK allow them to do so if Scotland votes to leave
attributes.additional_details: I think that a region of Scotland that voted to remain in the UK in any future Scottish independence referendum should be allowed to stay part of the UK. I think is a good idea because this is what they voted for in any future Scottish independence referendum
attributes.background: In any future Scottish independence referendum, Any region of Scotland that voted Remain should be allowed to remain in the UK

rejection.details:
A number of attempts have been made to start petitions making requests similar to this petition, using what appear to be fake names and email addresses.

We can only consider a petition if the creator has started it using their full, legal name, so if you would like to proceed with your petition please can you contact us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk so we can verify your identity.
